content.TOOLTIP: You want to sell to clients
content.SUBTITLE: You want to sell to clients, market it!
content.desc_fr: You know your market, your clients, your target, let's move to operational marketing and build your mix marketing and marketing plan.From the 4Ps, 4Cs to the 10Ps.
content.desc_en: You know your market, your clients, your target, let's move to operational marketing and build your mix marketing and marketing plan.From the 4Ps, 4Cs to the 10Ps.
